articles.title: No need to wipe down groceries or takeout, experts say, but do wash your hands - CNN
articles.description: In our search for control over coronavirus, America has taken to wiping down our groceries and takeout food, but the true risk is tiny, experts say. More important preventions are proper hand-washing and social distancing.
